title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4111.26 - Segregation of fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4111.26 - Segregation of fees

State Regulations

All fees paid in added money events, early closing
events, stakes and futurities shall be segregated and held as trust funds until
the event is contested. Proof of such segregation by bank letter or bank
statement shall be submitted to the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4111.26

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
